dialogue.speaker: Bob
dialogue.message: I suggest we focus on identifying any unusual behavior or inconsistencies among us to help narrow down the possibilities and increase the chances of discovering the assassin. Let's work together and keep an open mind.

dialogue.speaker: Alice

dialogue.speaker: Charlie

dialogue.speaker: Bob
dialogue.message: Based on the information provided, I support Alice's investigation and suggest we continue gathering evidence against Charlie while maintaining a discreet approach to avoid raising any suspicion. Let's keep the communication open and work together to ensure the safety of the village.

dialogue.speaker: Charlie
